get your response back to us and back to the game engine and your response is is really simple it's up down left or right
just which direction do you want to move and you have a 500 milliseconds to decide that but it's all happening in

you're longer then the other player gets eliminated and so this means there's this awesome trade-off between defensive
and aggressive play you can try to get food and try to gain length advantages
